title: Project Design Based on CPS (Cyber-Physical Systems) Reliability Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Systematic learning of CPS reliability evaluation methodologies based on digital tool-enabled practical environments, with project implementation applying mathematical modeling and data analysis techniques

learning_goals: Learners can represent a reliability evaluation framework for CPS systems as a mathematical model
Learners can explain the operational principles of machine learning-based real-time assessment algorithms and verify them through simulation
Learners can design a process for deriving comprehensive trust indicators for CPS control models through spatiotemporal correlation analysis
Learners can establish defense resource optimization strategies in distributed cooperative control environments and simulate them with mathematical prediction models
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
